abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, said he had no plans to push for a sale of Lions Gate Entertainment in the current environment, but he criticized the Hollywood studio’s expenses for being too high and called its purchase of TV Guide “reckless,” Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn, the activist investor, said he had no plans to push for a sale of Lions Gate Entertainment in the current environment, but he criticized the Hollywood studio’s expenses for being too high and called its purchase of TV Guide “reckless,” Reuters reported.

headline.main: Icahn Says He Has No Plans to Shop Lions Gate
